verses.verse: (All Lands Summoned to Praise God) A Psalm of thanksgiving. (Ps 98.4) Make a joyful noise to the LORD, all the earth.
Serve the LORD with gladness; come into his presence with singing.
(Ps 46.10; 95.6, 7) Know that the LORD is God. It is he who made us, and we are his; (Or and not we ourselves) we are his people and the sheep of his pasture.
(Ps 95.2; 96.2) Enter his gates with thanksgiving and his courts with praise. Give thanks to him; bless his name.
(Ps 25.8; 119.90) For the LORD is good; his steadfast love endures forever and his faithfulness to all generations.
